channel.title: Shameless Self Promotion on vBrownbag Techtalk Hugo Demo page
channel.description: Recent content in Shameless Self Promotion on vBrownbag Techtalk Hugo Demo page

item.title: Hello vBB
item.description: Hello vBrownbag This site is generated by hugo. For more information check out ThomGreene.com\hugo Git Submodule If you want to publish on github pages out of the site directory, create a git submodule to allow the public folder to commit to a different repo from the site files. For step by step instructions go to The Official Documentation
